name: 查尔斯·奥古斯丁·德·库仑
bio_short: 法国物理学家和军事工程师。他发明了精密的“扭秤”，并用它确立了静电学的基本定律——“库仑定律”（F=k(q₁q₂/r²)），将电学带入了定量科学的时代。
bio_short_en: A French physicist and military engineer. He invented the precision 'torsion balance' and used it to establish the fundamental law of electrostatics, 'Coulomb's Law' (F=k(q₁q₂/r²)), ushering electricity into the era of quantitative science.
